mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Burgett, Hiram

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Burgett, Hiram Patient Age: 43. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot flesh wound left hip. Location Wounded: Kernstown, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/24. Nature of Wound: Conical bullet. Result: Discharged from service.
